ardasEnglish.English: Too <font color='#FFA500'>Thakur</font> Tum Peh Ardaas
Jee-o <font color='#FFA500'>Pind Sabh Tayree Raas
Tum Maat <font color='#FFA500'>Pitaa</font> Ham Baarik Tayray
Tumree Kirpaa <font color='#FFA500'>Meh</font> Sookh Ghanayray
Ko-ay Na <font color='#FFA500'>Jaanai</font> Tumraa Ant
Oochay <font color='#FFA500'>Tay</font> Oochaa Bhagvant
Sagal <font color='#FFA500'>Samagree</font> Tumrai Sutir Dharee
Tum Tay <font color='#FFA500'>Hoay</font> So Aagi-aakaaree
Tumree Gat <font color='#FFA500'>Mit</font> Tum Hee Jaanee
Nanak <font color='#FFA500'>Das</font> Sadaa Kurbaanee
ARDAAS
Vaaheguroo jee kee Fateh
Sree Bhagautee jee Sahaae
Vaar Sree Bhagautee jee kee Paatshaahee Dassveen
<font color='#009900'>Pritham</font> Bhagatee simar <font color='#FFA500'>kaae</font> Guroo Nanak laeen Dhiaaae
Phir Angad Gur tae <font color='#FFA500'>AmarDaas</font> RamDaasaae hoeen sahaaae
Arjan Hargobind <font color='#FFA500'>no</font> simro Sree Har Raae
Sree HarKishan <font color='#FFA500'>dhiaaeeaae</font> jis dithaae sabhe dukhe jaaaae
TegBahaadur <font color='#FFA500'>simriaae</font> ghar naau nidhe aavaae dhaae
Sabh <font color='#FFA500'>thaaeen</font> hoe sahaae
Dassvaen PaatShah Sree Guru Gobind Sigh Sahib jee sabh thaaeen hoe sahaae
Dassaan Paatshaaheeaan dee jot Sree Guroo Granth Sahib jee dae paath deedaar daa dheaan dhar kae, bolo jee Vaaheguroo
Panjaan piaareaan, chauhaan Sahibzaadeaan,
chaalee mukteaan, hatheeaan, jappeeaan, tappeeaan,
jinhaan Naam japeaa, vand chhakeaa
daeg chalaaee, tegh vaahee,
daekh kae andith keetaa,
tinhaan piaareaan, sacheaareaan dee kamaaee daa dheaan dhar kae, Khaalsaa jee! bolo jee Vaaheguroo
Jinhaan singhaan singhaniaan nae dharam haet sees dittae,
band band kataaae, khopariaan luhaaeeaan,
charkhareeaan tae charhae, aareaan naal chiraaae gaae,
Gurdvaareaan dee saevaa laee kurbaaniaan keetiaan,
dharam naheen haareaa, Sikhee kaesaan svaasaan naal nibhaaee,
tena pratan ate vartmaan samay de sarbat shaheed dee kamaaee daa dheaan dhar kae, Khaalsaa jee bolo jee Vaaheguroo
Panjaan Takhtaan, sarbatt Gurdvaareaan daa dheaan dhar, kae bolo jee Vaaheguroo
Prathmae sarbatt Khaalsaa jee kee Ardaas haae jee,
sarbatt Khaalsaa jee ko Vaheguroo, Vaheguroo, Vaheguroo chitt aavae,
chitt aavan kaa sadkaa, sarab sukh hovae
Jahaan Jahaan Khaalsaa jee Sahib, tahaan tahaan rachheaa riaait,
daeg taeg Fateh, bird kee paaej,
Panth kee jeet, Siree sahib jee sahaaae,
Khalsae jee kae bol baalae, bolo jee Vaaheguroo
Sikhaan noon Sikhee daan, Kaes daan, Reht daan, bibaek daan,
visaah daan, bharosaa daan, daanaan sir daan Naam daan,
sree Amritsar jee dae darshan ishnaan,
Chukiaan, Jhandae, Bungae jugo jugg atall,
dharam kaa jaaekaar, Bolo jee Vaaheguroo
Sikhaan daa mann neevaan, matt ouchee,
matt daa raakhaa AkaalPurkh Vaaheguroo
Hae Akaal Purkh! aapanae Panth dae sadaa sahaaee Dataar jeeo!
samhu Gurdvaareaan Gurdhaamaan dae khullhae darshan deedaar
tae sevaa sanbhaal daa daan Khaalsa jee noon bakhsho
Hae Nimaaneaan dae Maan, Nitaaneaan dae Taan,
Nioteaan dee Out, Sachae Pitaa Vaaheguroo!
Aap de hazoor NitNaem dee Ardaas haae jee,
Akharr daa vaadhaa ghaataa bhull chukk maaf karnaa
sarbatt dae karaj raas karnae
saeee piaarae mael, jinhaan miliaan Taeraa Naam chitt aavae
Nanak Naam charhdee kalaa
Tarae bhaanae sarbatt daa bhalaa
Vaaheguroo jee kaa Khalsa Vaaheguroo jee kee Fateh
Dohra
Aagya Bhyee Akaal Ki Tabai Chla-ay-o Panth
Sabh Sikkhan Ko Hukam Hai Guru Manyo Granth
Guru Granth Ji Manyo Pargat Guran Ki Dayh
Jo Prabh Ko Milbo Ch-hai Khoj Shabad Meh Layh
Raj Karega Khalsa Aaki R-hai Na Koi
Khuar Ho-ay Sabh Milaingay Bachay Sharan Jo Ho-ay
Waheguru Naam Jahaaj Hai Chareh So Uttrey Paar
Jo Sharda Kar Sev De, Gur Paar Utaran Haar
Bolay So Nihaal,
Sat Sri Akal
Waheguru Ji Ka Khalsa, Waheguru Ji Ki Fateh
